Question
========

The null hypothesis states that the mean is 0 and the alternative hypothesis states that the mean is greater than 0. If the alternative hypothesis is true, then the probability of the result found or more extreme to

Answerlist
----------

* The Type I error.
* The Type II error.
* The power.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The Type I error...: Incorrect
* The Type II error...: Incorrect
* The power..: Correct
